abstract: Sprint Nextel formally announced its opposition to AT&T’s proposed purchase of T-Mobile USA, saying that the deal would drastically cut down on cellphone service competition.
snippet: Sprint Nextel formally announced its opposition to AT&T’s proposed purchase of T-Mobile USA, saying that the deal would drastically cut down on cellphone service competition.
lead_paragraph: Sprint Nextel formally announced its opposition to AT&T‘s proposed $39 billion purchase of T-Mobile USA on Monday, saying that the deal would drastically cut down on cellphone service competition in the country.

headline.main: Sprint Formally Denounces AT&T’s Deal for T-Mobile

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
